ue8

Class WorldUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • ue8.WorldUtilities

  • public class WorldUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utilities to read World-object from file or write a World-object to file.
    Author:
    Paul Jureschek, Michael Kinzkofer
